text: niyata vasayenma pratiksepa karannangen kavurun tamange vastun allahge margayehi (janatavage) yama valakva dæmimata viyadam karannoda, ovun (nævata) nævatat me andamatama viyadam karana men sidu vi avasanayedi eya ovuntama dukak bavata pat vi yanu æta! pasuva ovunta erehiva jayagrahanaya karanu labayi. (mevæni) pratiksepa karannan (paralovadi) niraya desatama padavagena yanu labannaha
